channel.title: Customize claims in the ID and Access tokens on DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Recent content in Customize claims in the ID and Access tokens on DevDocs Navigation Menu Test

item.title: Add custom user attributes (claims)
item.description: Add custom user attributes (claims) Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: Claims are user attributes that are returned in tokens. This is the R part of CRUD in “Manage user accounts” Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: - Customize tokens returned from Okta with custom claims: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/customize-tokens-returned-from-okta/main/ Structure type: Task Content type: How-to: developer focused A How-to document illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code.

item.title: Add the user groups claim
item.description: Add the user groups claim Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: This doc is under Manage user accounts because it discuss return the user’s group information Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: - Customize tokens returned from Okta with a Groups claim: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/customize-tokens-groups-claim/main/ Structure type: Task Content type: How-to: developer focused A How-to document illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code.

item.title: Filter the groups claim with a dynamic allow list
item.description: Filter the groups claim with a dynamic allow list Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: This doc discuss returning a filtered list of groups that pertain to the user and app. It’s reading and returning user/group info and pertains to the R aspect of user CRUD. Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: - Customize tokens returned from Okta with a dynamic allow list: https://developer.

Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: - Customize tokens returned from Okta with a static allow list: https://developer.
